name: product_categorization
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool product_categorization.
Tool description: Determine products and organization of products into their respective categories. Predict product price base on name of product or product title.
API description: Categorizes a product based on its title and optional price using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

title.description: The title of the product to be categorized.
title.default: Abstract Egghead Plus Size Female Mannequin - Matte White Item

price.description: The price of the product. Default is 200.
